name: Luing
greetingText: Sorry I made a nickname for you, it means you are a special person :)
wishText: Hopefully, I can always see your sweet smile :p
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: It's a classic saying that most people do.
text3: But I think that's not enough.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
